entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 02 January 2023
